title: Gustave Caillebotte Paris Street; Rainy Day Mug
description:
Mug developed from Gustave Caillebotte’s Paris Street; Rainy Day, 1877, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

A masterpiece from our collection can be enjoyed every day along with breakfast or afternoon tea! 

  • Size: 11oz.
  • Dimensions: 3.2 x 3.75 in.
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Dishwasher (top rack) and microwave safe.
